game.name: ARIE: Moonprayer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ARIE: Moonprayer is a beautiful, short 3D anime exploration experience through an ending world, where melodies weave through your final journey on earth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ARIE: Moonprayer is a beautiful, short 3D anime exploration experience through an ending world, where melodies weave through your final journey on earth.
